name: Passing Flame: Post-Jam
description:
Summary:

You're in a world where your lights about to wither away and gust monster are out to destroy you, see how long you can last.

Controls:

Use W,A,S,D  Q,Z,S,D or Controller to move character.

High score:

005900

Improvements from original:

A bigger map.

Now supports azerty and joystick.

Minor Fixes from original:

Enemies don't go through walls anymore.

Enemies disappear after hitting player.

Arrow now goes transparent after getting close to the flame.
